settings.help_text: If set the plugin will also filter posts containing plain text links in addition to filtering embedded text links.
If post is rejected, this warning message will be sent to the user. Place `%s` where you want to include the forbidden URL Scheme in the message.
settings.placeholder: E.g., Your post has been rejected by the Link Filter, because the following URL Scheme is not allowed: `%s`.
settings.default: Your post has been rejected by the Link Filter, because the following URL Scheme is not allowed: `%s`.

settings.help_text: The protocols to allow, separated by commas. Capitalization and punctuation insensitive.
